info.title: Microsoft Cognitive Language Service - Analyze Conversations
info.description:
The language service conversations API is a suite of natural language processing (NLP) skills that can be used to analyze structured conversations (textual or spoken). The synchronous API in this suite accepts a request and mediates among multiple language projects, such as LUIS Generally Available, Question Answering, Conversational Language Understanding, and then calls the best candidate service to handle the request. At last, it returns a response with the candidate service's response as a payload.

 In some cases, this API needs to forward requests and responses between the caller and an upstream service. The asynchronous APIs in this suite enable tasks like Conversation Summarization and Conversational PII detection.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Collection of conversations to analyze and a single task to execute.

x-ms-error-code.description: The error code for specific error that occurred.

202.description: The request has been accepted for processing, but processing has not yet completed.

Operation-Location.description: The location for monitoring the operation state.

get.description: Get the status of an analysis job. A job can consist of one or more tasks. After all tasks succeed, the job transitions to the succeeded state and results are available for each task.

parameters.name: showStats
parameters.description: (Optional) if set to true, response will contain request and document level statistics.

post.summary: Cancel a long-running Text Analysis conversations job
post.description: Cancel a long-running job for text analysis of conversations.

confidenceScore.description: Predicted score of answer span, value ranges from 0 to 1.

offset.description: The answer span offset from the start of answer.

length.description: The length of the answer span.

AnswersOptions.description: Parameters to query a knowledge base.

top.description: Max number of answers to be returned for the question.

ConversationParameters.description: This is a set of request parameters for Customized Conversation projects.

callingOptions.description: The option to set to call a Conversation project.

ConversationPiiCategories.description: Describes the PII categories to return for detection. If not provided, 'default' categories will be returned which will vary with the language.

ConversationPiiCategoriesExclude.description: Describes the PII categories to exclude for detection. If not provided, 'default' categories will be returned which will vary with the language.

ConversationPiiItemResult.description: The result from PII detection and redaction operation for each conversation.

redactedContent.description: Transcript content response that the service generates, with all necessary personally identifiable information redacted.

ConversationPiiResults.description: The result from PII detection and redaction operation for each conversation.

modelVersion.description: This field indicates which model is used for scoring.

ConversationPiiTaskParameters.description: Supported parameters for a conversational pii task.

redactAudioTiming.description: Flag to indicate if response should include audio stream offset and duration for any detected entities to be redacted. By default, audio timing of redacted entities are not included.

redactionSource.description: For transcript conversations, this parameter provides information regarding which content type (ITN, Text, Lexical, Masked ITN) should be used for entity detection. The details of the entities detected - like the offset, length and the text itself - will correspond to the text type selected here.

redactionCharacter.description: Optional parameter to use a Custom Character to be used for redaction in PII responses. Default character will be * as before. We allow specific ascii characters for redaction.

excludePiiCategories.description: List of categories that need to be excluded instead of included.

ConversationPrediction.description: Represents the prediction section of a Conversation project.

erroneousDocumentsCount.description: Number of invalid documents. This includes empty, over-size limit or non-supported languages documents.

transactionsCount.description: Number of transactions for the request.

conversationsCount.description: Number of conversations submitted in the request.

validConversationsCount.description: Number of conversation documents. This excludes documents that are empty, over the size limit, or in unsupported languages.

erroneousConversationsCount.description: Number of invalid documents. This includes documents that are empty, over the size limit, or in unsupported languages.

values.name: TextElements_v8
values.description: Returned offset and length values will correspond to TextElements (Graphemes and Grapheme clusters) confirming to the Unicode 8.0.0 standard. Use this option if your application is written in .Net Framework or .Net Core and you will be using StringInfo.

values.name: UnicodeCodePoint
values.description: Returned offset and length values will correspond to Unicode code points. Use this option if your application is written in a language that support Unicode, for example Python.

values.name: Utf16CodeUnit
values.description: Returned offset and length values will correspond to UTF-16 code units. Use this option if your application is written in a language that support Unicode, for example Java, JavaScript.

summaryLength.description: (NOTE: Recommended to use summaryLength over sentenceCount) Controls the approximate length of the output summaries.

stringIndexType.description: Specifies the method used to interpret string offsets.  Defaults to Text Elements (Graphemes) according to Unicode v8.0.0. For additional information see https://aka.ms/text-analytics-offsets.

CurrencyResolution.description: Represents the currency entity resolution model.

ISO4217.description: The alphabetic code based on another ISO standard, ISO 3166, which lists the codes for country names. The first two letters of the ISO 4217 three-letter code are the same as the code for the country name, and, where possible, the third letter corresponds to the first letter of the currency name.

value.description: The money amount captured in the extracted entity

unit.description: The unit of the amount captured in the extracted entity

EntitySubtype.description: The concrete entity Subtype model of extra information.

tags.description: List of entity tags. Tags express similarities between entity categories for the extracted entity type.

EntityTag.description: Tags express similarities between entity categories for the extracted entity type.

confidenceScore.description: The confidence score of the tag for the extracted entity between 0.0 and 1.0.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

InformationResolution.description: Represents the information (data) entity resolution model.

value.description: The numeric value that the extracted text denotes.

InnerErrorModel.description: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Microsoft One API guidelines - https://github.com/Microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/Guidelines.md#7102-error-condition-responses.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

InputWarning.description: Contains details of warnings encountered during a job execution.

questions.description: List of questions associated with the answer.

confidenceScore.description: Answer confidence score, value ranges from 0 to 1.

metadata.description: Metadata associated with the answer, useful to categorize or filter question answers.

answerSpan.description: Answer span object of QnA with respect to user's question.

KnowledgeBaseAnswerContext.description: Context object with previous QnA's information.

previousQnaId.description: Previous turn top answer result QnA ID.

isContextOnly.description: To mark if a prompt is relevant only with a previous question or not. If true, do not include this QnA as search result for queries without context; otherwise, if false, ignores context and includes this QnA in search result.

prompts.description: List of prompts associated with the answer.

displayOrder.description: Index of the prompt - used in ordering of the prompts.

qnaId.description: QnA ID corresponding to the prompt.

displayText.description: Text displayed to represent a follow up question prompt.

LengthResolution.description: Represents the length entity resolution model.

value.description: The numeric value that the extracted text denotes.

ListKey.description: The list key extra data kind.

key.description: The canonical form of the extracted entity.

LuisCallingOptions.description: This customizes how the service calls LUIS Generally Available projects.

log.description: Save log to add in training utterances later.

show-all-intents.description: Set true to show all intents.

timezoneOffset.description: The timezone offset for the location of the request.

bing-spell-check-subscription-key.description: The subscription key to use when enabling Bing spell check

NumericRangeResolution.description: represents the resolution of numeric intervals.

rangeKind.description: The kind of range that the resolution object represents.

minimum.description: The beginning value of  the interval.

maximum.description: The ending value of the interval.

OrchestrationPrediction.description: This represents the prediction result of an Orchestration project.

intents.description: A dictionary that contains all intents. A key is an intent name and a value is its confidence score and target type. The top intent's value also contains the actual response from the target project.

OrdinalResolution.description: A resolution for ordinal numbers entity instances.

offset.description: The offset With respect to the reference (e.g., offset = -1 in "show me the second to last"

relativeTo.description: The reference point that the ordinal number denotes.

value.description: A simple arithmetic expression that the ordinal denotes.

logicalOperation.description: Logical operation used to join metadata filter with source filter.

text.description: Redacted output for input in text (Microsoft's speech-to-text 'display') format.

lexical.description: Redacted output for input in lexical format.

regexPattern.description: The .NET regex pattern used in extracting the entity. Please visit https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/standard/base-types/regular-expressions for more information about .NET regular expressions.

RelativeTo.description: The reference point that the ordinal number denotes.

SentimentConfidenceScores.description: Represents the confidence scores between 0 and 1 across all sentiment classes: positive, neutral, negative.

ShortAnswerOptions.description: To configure Answer span prediction feature.

enable.description: Enable or disable Answer Span prediction.

confidenceScoreThreshold.description: Minimum threshold score required to include an answer span, value ranges from 0 to 1.

topAnswersWithSpan.description: Number of Top answers to be considered for span prediction from 1 to 10.

SourceFilter.description: Find QnAs that are associated with any of the given list of sources in knowledge base.

SpeedResolution.description: Represents the speed entity resolution model.

value.description: The numeric value that the extracted text denotes.

State.description: The status of the task at the mentioned last update time.

SummaryAspect.description: Supported parameters for a conversational summarization task.

values.name: issue
values.description: Summary of issues in transcripts of web chats and service calls between customer-service agents and customers.

values.name: resolution
values.description: Summary of resolutions in transcripts of web chats and service calls between customer-service agents and customers.

values.name: chapterTitle
values.description: Chapter title of any conversation. It's usually one phrase or several phrases naturally combined. Long conversations tend to have more chapters. You can find the chapter boundary from the summary context.

values.name: narrative
values.description: Generic narrative summary of any conversation. It generally converts the conversational language into formal written language, compresses the text length, and keeps the salient information.

values.name: recap
values.description: A concise one-paragraph summary to provide a quick overview.

values.name: follow-up tasks
values.description: Action items and tasks that arose during a meeting.

SummaryLengthBucket.description: Enum that defines the length of the output summaries.

values.name: short
values.description: Instructs model to generate shorter length summaries.

values.name: medium
values.description: Instructs model to generate medium length summaries.

values.name: long
values.description: Instructs model to generate longer length summaries.

modelVersion.description: This field indicates which model is used for scoring.

TargetIntentResult.description: This is the base class of an intent prediction

targetProjectKind.description: This is the base class of an intent prediction

apiVersion.description: The API version used to call a target service.

confidenceScore.description: The prediction score and it ranges from 0.0 to 1.0.

Tasks.description: Contains the state for the tasks that are being executed as part of the submitted job for analyzing a conversation.

completed.description: Count of tasks that finished successfully.

inProgress.description: Count of tasks that are currently in progress.

total.description: Total count of tasks submitted as part of the job.

items.description: List of results from tasks (if available).

TemperatureResolution.description: Represents the temperature entity resolution model.

value.description: The numeric value that the extracted text denotes.

TemporalModifier.description: An optional modifier of a date/time instance.

TemporalSpanResolution.description: represents the resolution of a date and/or time span.

begin.description: represents the resolution of a date and/or time span. An extended ISO 8601 date/time representation as described in (https://github.com/Microsoft/Recognizers-Text/blob/master/Patterns/English/English-DateTime.yaml)

end.description: represents the resolution of a date and/or time span. An extended ISO 8601 date/time representation as described in (https://github.com/Microsoft/Recognizers-Text/blob/master/Patterns/English/English-DateTime.yaml)

duration.description: An optional duration value formatted based on the ISO 8601 (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations)

modifier.description: An optional modifier of a date/time instance.

timex.description: An optional triplet containing the beginning, the end, and the duration all stated as ISO 8601 formatted strings.

values.name: neutral

values.name: negative

TranscriptContentType.description: Enumeration of supported transcript content types.

conversationItems.description: Ordered list of transcript conversation items in the conversation.

TranscriptConversationItem.description: Additional properties for supporting transcript conversation.

id.description: The ID of a conversation item.

participantId.description: The participant ID of a conversation item.

language.description: The override language of a conversation item in BCP 47 language representation.

itn.description: Inverse text normalization (ITN) representation of input. The inverse-text-normalized form is the recognized text from Microsoft's speech-to-text API, with phone numbers, numbers, abbreviations, and other transformations applied.

maskedItn.description: Inverse-text-normalized format with profanity masking applied.

text.description: Display form of the recognized text from the speech-to-text API, with punctuation and capitalization added.

lexical.description: Lexical form of the recognized text from the speech-to-text API, with the actual words recognized.

wordLevelTimings.description: List of word-level audio timing information.

conversationItemLevelTiming.description: Audio timing at the conversation item level. This still can help with AI quality if word-level audio timings are not available.

VolumeResolution.description: Represents the volume entity resolution model.

value.description: The numeric value that the extracted text denotes.

WeightResolution.description: Represents the weight entity resolution model.

value.description: The numeric value that the extracted text denotes.

WordLevelTiming.description: Word-level timing information that the speech-to-text API generates. The words in this object should have 1:1 correspondence with the lexical input to allow for audio redaction.

offset.description: Offset from the start of speech audio, in ticks. 1 tick = 100 nanoseconds.

duration.description: Duration of word articulation, in ticks. 1 tick = 100 nanoseconds.

values.name: customer
values.description: The participant is a customer.

values.name: agent
values.description: The participant is an agent.

values.name: generic
values.description: The is a generic participant.

targetProjectKind.description: The type of a target service.
